Reviews.Title: nikon camera
Reviews.Author: Allen D Williams
Reviews.Content: The camera is awesome, it brings the deer from 100 yards, up to 15 feet. The case however, is a struggle to get the nikon camera into the vivitar case. I have nerve damage and my fingers don't work so good.

Reviews.Title: Perfect Camera, not so for the aditional kit.
Reviews.Author: Maria Eugenia Zorrilla De San Martin
Reviews.Content: The camera was perfect and it really has a great picture quality! Anyway, the 6pc Bundle Accesory Kit arrived all ruined because the cleaning liquid opened in the bag and ruined everything in it. We could only use the mini tripod and the camera bag; the rest was all ruined and we couldn't use it.Despite this, the camera arrived perfect and I really liked it, but I would have prefered not to buy the aditional kit.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Bought for Christmas for my wife, she loves it and takes fantastic pictures.  Every The came as promised, had one little issue but contacted the vendor and said they would take care of it asap, very happy with purchase and would buy again.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Kit includes 7 items all with USA Warranty and manufacturer's supplied accessories
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom and Full HD 1080p videos (Black)
8 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - Universal Memory Card Wallet
Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets & Strap - Package of LCD Screen Protectors
Flexible Legged Mini Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit  - BONUS!! FREE 25 Quality Prints (promo code# on invoice)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP Digital Camera with 30x Zoom (Black) + 6pc Bundle 8GB Accessory Kit
